General.Name: Joyoung Co Ltd
General.Description: Joyoung Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, production, and sale of home appliances in China and internationally. The company offers soymilk machines, induction cookers, rice cookers, air fryer, cooking machines, wall breakers, cooking utensils, water purifiers, electric steamers, boiling water pots, noodle makers, hot pots, meat grinders, juice machines, water- electric stew pots, iron kettles, sandwich makers, milk conditioners, frying machines, electric and steam ovens, grills, sterilizers, food supplement machines, toasters, egg boilers, thermos bottles and kettles, tea bar and drink machines, smart mugs and cups, garlic mashers, non-stick pans, scrubbers, and other products. It offers its products through stores, as well as online. Joyoung Co.,Ltd was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Jinan, China. Joyoung Co.,Ltd is a subsidiary of Shanghai Lihong Enterprise Management Co., Ltd.
